constantMsgs.ajaxError: حدث خطأ أثناء تحديث البيانات من بروفيت تريلر. يرجى التحقق من اتصالك بالانترنت. إذا كان اتصالك جيدًا ، فقم بتحديث الصفحة والحصول علي فنجان شاي
constantMsgs.processingError: حدث خطأ أثناء معالجة البيانات الواردة من بروفيت تريلر. يرجى إعطاء بروفيت تريلر بعض الحب ، وصنع القهوة ، وسوف يكون كل شيء علي ما يرام قريبًا

alertMsgs.boughtCostText: You can find the formatting of the bought cost command in our wiki. Check the link in the footer.

DCACalculator.OverUnderBalancePercentage: أكثر من / تحت إجمالي نسبة الرصيد

applicationPort.help: The port that is being used by the bot. Change this value to something unique (like 8082, etc) if you want to start other instances of the bot on the same machine.

siteName.help: Set the unique text you wish to appear in the browser tab (website title). This it also used in Discord and Telegram Notifications.

apiToken.help: This optional token can be used to allow third party applications to connection to your BOT via a built in API.

serverAddress.help: Bind the Profit trailer instance to a specific WAN/Public IP address. Useful for uses with multiple public IP addresses and multiple bots.

serverContextPath.help: Adds a custom base url to the Web server. Using the example above you would now access ProfitTrailer from http://localhost:8081/binancebtc/monitoring.

exchangeURL.help: Define custom url to be used when a coin pair is clicked in the Web GUI. The %c and %b values are variables based on the coin pair being clicked.

logHistory.help: Set how many days of sell log history to show in the GUI. Once the set number of days passes, older history will be removed from the bot.

startBalance.help: The balance you had when first starting. Also used to calculate TCV based profit %

profitCalculationMethod.help: The method used to calculate profit displayed on the GUI.

buyOrderType.help: The order type you want ProfitTrailer to buy with.

sellOrderType.help: The order type you want ProfitTrailer to sell with.

tradingDelay.help: The start delay prevents the bot from trading for the set number of minutes after bootup. This parameter is designed to give you enough time to place the bot in SOM or disable trading, or change your buy/sell strategies before it resumes trading.

timezone.help: Set the timezone ID of the location you live. This will take precedence over server.timezone_offset and will automatically handle daylight saving times.

advancedStats.help: Pro/Advanced Users only: Set to false to disable advanced statistics in the GUI.

tableButtons.help: Shows Buy, Sell and Pending buttons in tables.

offlineConfig.help: Set to true to enable local offline storage of settings instead of on the PT database. Settings (excluding application.properties) will still be communicated to the PT server for encryption but will be stored locally in a file named offlineData. Settings must still be edited using the web GUI.

enableNotifications.help: Set to true to disable the GUI notifications (errors, config changes etc).

enableAdvancedNotifications.help: Set to true and save your settings to enable Advanced Notifications.

advancedConfig.help: Pro/Advanced Users only: Set to false to disable advanced statistics in the GUI.

hideBuySell.help: Pro/Advanced Users only: Set to false to disable advanced statistics in the GUI.

skin.help: Choose between three possible skins dark, light and default.

currency.help: Set your desired currency for values in the Web GUI to be displayed in.

language.help: Set your desired localization for the Web GUI.

PTNSellMessage.help: #Available variables: dcaCount, instanceName, strategies, quantity, rate, total, profit, dollar, boughtDate, percentage

PTNBuyMessage.help: #Available variables: dcaCount, instanceName, quantity, rate, avgCost, total, percentage

PTNErrorMessage.help: #Add error messages that need to be ignored seperated by a comma i.e. SomeKindOfExchangeError,AnotherExchangeError. Can be BinanceWebSocketAdapterKline,APIKEY_INVALID

discordChatId.help: The channel name that the bot will post notifications in.

newSignal.help: Set to true to enable a notification to be sent when a new signal is received.

startup.help: Set to true to add notifications on startup.

shutdown.help: Set to true to add notifications on shutdown. Will not work for unexpected shutdowns.

newSignalChannel.help: A separate channel for new SIGNAL notifications to be sent to. If nothing is set Chat from discord instance 1 will be used instead.

keyStore.help: Add the path to your keystore file.

notificationAlerts.error: An error occurred while sending the notification.
notificationAlerts.empty: Please fill out the appropriate fields.

accountPage.settingSaveError: Something went wrong while saving your settings.
accountPage.notChanged: You have not changed any settings
accountPage.reloadOrRefresh: Your Bot might need a restart/reload after changing settings.

redeemVoucher.selectHelp: Select the category for your Voucher Key

toastr.voucherText: Make sure you have entered the voucher code correctly.
toastr.specifyVoucher: You have not specified a Vouhcer Code

signalProvider.selectHelpText:
Select the signal providers you want this bot to accept signals from.
 Leave ALL Disabled to accept signals from ALL your providers.
signalProvider.selectFromThese: You can select from the following list of providers
signalProvider.SGNLErrorText: You have not yet bought a signal package or redeemed your voucher with the PT Assistant.

hotConfig.swalText: Are you sure you want to save the following command:
hotConfig.startBalanceError: Please insert a proper start balance.
hotConfig.buyTimesError: Please select a pair and insert the number of DCA levels.
hotConfig.boughtPriceError: Please select a pair and insert a proper bought price.

testModeBalance.title: Test Mode Balance
testModeBalance.help: Set or change the starting Balance for test bots. Decimals higher than or equal to 0.

setBuyTimes.title: DCA Set Buy Times
setBuyTimes.help: Set the DCA level on a coin. If you want ProfitTrailer to see it has DCA'd 2 times set 2

boughtPrice.title: Set Bought Price
boughtPrice.help: Set the bought price if the bot could not calculate the price correctly. The price you put in here will be set as the current average price of your pair.

reserveAmount.title: Reserve an amount of {{pair}}
reserveAmount.text: Enter an amount you want to reserve

releaseAmount.title: Release an amount of {{pair}}
releaseAmount.text: Enter an amount you want to release

reversal.title: Cancel Reversal for coin: {{pair}}
reversal.text: Are you sure you want to cancel the reversal for this coin?
